'''Rosamunda Bolger, n√©e Took''', was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Rosamunda was the daughter of [[Sigismond Took]].<ref>{{App|Took}}</ref> She married [[Odovacar Bolger|Odovacar]] of the [[Bolger Family]], and had two children: [[Fredegar Bolger|Fredegar]] and [[Estella Brandybuck|Estella]]. The couple and their children attended [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]] in {{SR|1401}}.<ref>{{App|Bolger}}</ref>

==Etymology==
In the middle ages, the name was believed to mean ''rosa munda'', Latin for "pure rose", but it derived from ''hros'' "horse" and ''mund'' "hand, protection".<ref>{{HM|IE}}, "Giving of Names"</ref>
